channel.title: proxychains on 无岸的Blog
channel.description: Recent content in proxychains on 无岸的Blog

item.title: 解决proxychains不支持yay的问题
item.description: 问题如下 $ proxychains yay -S petal [proxychains] config file found: /etc/proxychains.conf [proxychains] preloading /usr/lib/libproxychains4.so [proxychains] DLL init: proxychains-ng 4.14 Get https://aur.archlinux.org/rpc.php?arg%5B%5D=petal&type=info&v=5: dial tcp 224.0.0.1:443: connect: network is unreachable 解决方法 修改proxychains配置文件，把proxy_dns注释掉。 打开proxyc
